title: 'Give Australia the urn' - England in trouble as Cummins removes Root
summary: Pat Cummins takes his second wicket of the innings as Joe Root is caught behind for 19 as England fall to 71-4 in their first innings, 300 runs behind Australia's 371, as the home side take control on day two of the third Ashes Test in Adelaide.

title: 'A little fairytale' - Lyon overtakes McGrath in Test wicket-taker list
summary: The Australia spinner now sits sixth on the all-time list with 564 wickets after removing Ollie Pope and Ben Duckett in the third Ashes Test in Adelaide.

title: 'England are crumbling' - Lyon removes Pope and Duckett in same over

title: Archer finishes with five wickets as Australia bowled out for 371
